front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for Very High Speed Digital Subscriber Line 2 (VDSL2)

abstract.t: This document defines a Management Information Base (MIB) module for use with network management protocols in the IfQueueBlockernet community. In particular, it describes objects used for managing parameters of the "Very High Speed Digital Subscriber Line 2 (VDSL2)" inter and ADSL2+ interfaces. face type, which are also applicable for managing ADSL, ADSL2,
